title: 10-Minute Yoga for Beginners | Daily Fitness | Saurabh Bothra
description:
Join Free Yoga Challenge -  https://habuild.yoga/free
Join our WhatsApp Community: https://habuild.yoga/community

Check out my last video on How to STOP HAIRFALL? - https://youtu.be/kL4fxo2CJXA
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Ever wondered how you can start your yoga journey with just 10 minutes a day?  In this video, I bring you a perfect introduction to yoga with a 10-minute routine designed specifically for beginners. Whether you're new to yoga or looking to get back into the groove, this session will help you ease into the practice with simple, effective poses that anyone can do. You don't need any prior experience or special equipment—just a comfortable space and an open mind. I will guide you through gentle stretches and foundational poses that will help improve your flexibility, strength, and overall well-being. This short yet impactful routine is perfect for fitting into a busy schedule, ensuring you can find peace and relaxation in your day. Join me as we explore the basics of yoga, focusing on breathing techniques and mindful movements that will refresh you and revitalize you. By the end of this 10-minute session, you'll have a better understanding of yoga and how it can benefit your body and mind. So, roll out your mat, and let's begin this journey together!

#yoga #yogapractice #beginneryoga

About Habuild

HABUILD, is a technology-enabled platform that makes building sustainable habits simple, practical, and fun. 👈🏻 The platform helps people adopt a healthy lifestyle 🥗 by cultivating good habits such as 🧘🏻‍♂Yoga by promoting physical and mental well-being. Join us on your journey towards a balanced life. 💪🌱

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

About The Host

Saurabh Bothra is a government-certified yoga trainer, an IIT-ian, and a Co-Founder of HaBuild. His mission is to inspire a healthier life, using the transformative power of yoga and habit-building. Through this channel, we aim to unleash the most prominent health secrets in easy-to-implement ways that help you stick to your habits and eventually achieve your fitness goals.
